member.name: D3D12_VARIABLE_SHADING_RATE_TIER
member.summary: Defines constants that specify a shading rate tier (for variable-rate shading, or VRS). For more info, see Variable-rate shading (VRS).

member.name: D3D12_VARIABLE_SHADING_RATE_TIER.D3D12_VARIABLE_SHADING_RATE_TIER_NOT_SUPPORTED
member.summary: Specifies that variable-rate shading is not supported.

member.name: D3D12_VARIABLE_SHADING_RATE_TIER.D3D12_VARIABLE_SHADING_RATE_TIER_1
member.summary: Specifies that variable-rate shading tier 1 is supported.

member.name: D3D12_VARIABLE_SHADING_RATE_TIER.D3D12_VARIABLE_SHADING_RATE_TIER_2
member.summary: Specifies that variable-rate shading tier 2 is supported.
